Class PreviewLabel

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
    public class PreviewLabel
extends javax.swing.JLabel
    The icon ("label") that represents a styled mark in the GIS style editors.
    Author:
    Nick Collier, Eric Tatara
